query.statement:
SELECT '' AS SELECTED, Z36.* FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN ((Z24.DATE3 != '00000000' AND Z24.DATE3 != '') OR (Z37.DATE3 != '00000000' AND Z37.DATE3 != '')) THEN 'F' -- WHEN THEN 'P' WHEN Z36.REQ_GBN='3'THEN 'H' WHEN Z36.REQ_DATE2 > '00000000' AND VALUE(Z24.MANDT,Z37.MANDT,'') <> '' THEN 'C' WHEN Z36.REQ_GBN='2' AND VALUE(Z24.DATE1,Z24.DATE4,'')='' AND VALUE(Z37.DATE1,Z37.DATE4,'')='' THEN 'A' WHEN Z36.REQ_GBN='0' OR Z36.REQ_GBN='1' THEN 'R' ELSE '' END AS CHKSTATE ,Z36.PSPID AS PSPID ,Z36.POSID AS POSID ,Z36.ZZHOGIT AS ZZHOGIT ,Z36.ZSITE_NM AS POST1 ,Z36.CHK_KIND AS CHK_KIND ,Z36.CHASU AS CHASU ,Z36.CHK_LIFNR AS CHKORGCD ,Z36.REQ_DATE AS CHKREQDT ,Z36.REQ_DATE2 AS CHKDATE ,VALUE(Z24.DATE1,Z37.DATE1,'00000000') AS CHKACPDT ,VALUE(Z24.NUMBE,Z37.NUMBE,'') AS ACPNO ,(z38.bsamt + case when decimal(zm2.zspec7) <= z38.bsqnt then 0 else (decimal(zm2.zspec7)-z38.bsqnt) end * z38.price ) AS CHKAMT -- ,(select bsamt + case when decimal(zm2.zspec7) <= bsqnt then 0 else (decimal(zm2.zspec7)-bsqnt) end * price from saphee.zpst0038 where mandt=z36.mandt and hggbn=SUBSTR(z36.POSID,7,1) and ause=value((select ause from saphee.zpst0038 where mandt=z36.mandt and ause=z36.ause),'') and chk_kind=z36.chk_kind and (case z36.req_date2 when '00000000' then z36.req_date else z36.req_date2 end) between frmdt and todt) AS CHKAMT ,VALUE(Z24.DATE3,Z37.DATE3,'00000000') AS CHKFNLDT ,Z36.ZZACTSS AS ZZACTSS ,VALUE(ZLC.CTEXT2,'') AS ZZACTSSNM -- ,CASE WHEN ZTEAM='X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS ZTEAM ,Z36.LIFNR AS ZZLIFNR ,Z36.NAME1 AS ZZLIFNRNM ,Z36.PERNO AS REQPERNO ,Z36.REQ_CELL AS REQPERNOHP ,CASE VALUE(Z23.STATE,'') WHEN '3' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS JUNAPPYN ,Z36.ZZCOMP2 AS ZZCOMP2 ,Z24.ZZJUNGO AS ZZJUNGO ,VALUE(Z23.APPLD,'00000000') AS APPLD ,VALUE(Z23.APPLS,'00000000') AS APPLS ,Z36.ZSPEC1 AS ZSPEC1 ,Z36.ZSPEC2 AS ZSPEC2 ,Z36.AUSE AS AUSE -- ,VALUE(Z24.AUSE,Z37.AUSE,'') AS AUSE ,Z36.CDATE AS CDATE ,Z36.REQ_GBN AS REQ_GBN FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0036 AS Z36 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS ZM2 ON Z36.MANDT=ZM2.MANDT AND Z36.PSPID=ZM2.POSID AND Z36.POSID=ZM2.POSID_1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0038 AS Z38 ON Z36.MANDT=Z38.MANDT AND SUBSTR(Z36.POSID,7,1)=Z38.HGGBN AND Z36.CHK_KIND=Z38.CHK_KIND AND (CASE Z36.REQ_DATE2 WHEN '00000000' THEN Z36.REQ_DATE ELSE Z36.REQ_DATE2 END) BETWEEN Z38.FRMDT AND Z38.TODT
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0024 AS Z24 ON Z36.MANDT=Z24.MANDT AND Z36.PSPID=Z24.PSPID AND Z36.POSID=Z24.POSID AND Z36.CHASU='001' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0037 AS Z37 ON Z36.MANDT=Z37.MANDT AND Z36.PSPID=Z37.PSPID AND Z36.POSID=Z37.POSID --AND Z36.CHASU <> '001' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0023 AS Z23 ON Z23.MANDT=Z36.MANDT AND Z23.PSPID=Z36.PSPID AND Z23.POSID=Z36.POSID AND Z23.ZTYPE = '2' --ÁØ°ø LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS ZLC ON ZLC.MANDT=Z36.MANDT AND ZLC.LANG=#G_LANG# AND ZLC.CODE1='PS003' AND ZLC.CODE2=Z36.ZZACTSS WHERE Z36.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND Z38.AUSE=VALUE((SELECT AUSE FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0038 WHERE MANDT=Z36.MANDT AND AUSE=Z36.AUSE FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY),'')
AND Z36.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND Z36.CHK_KIND=#CHK_KIND#
AND Z36.CHK_LIFNR = #CHKORGCD#
AND Z36.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND Z36.LIFNR = #ZZLIFNR#
AND Z36.CDATE BETWEEN #FRDT# AND #TODT#
AND Z36.CFM_CDATE BETWEEN #FRDT# AND #TODT#
AND (Z24.DATE1 BETWEEN #FRDT# AND #TODT# OR Z37.DATE1 BETWEEN #FRDT# AND #TODT#)
) Z36
WHERE CHKSTATE=#CHKSTATE#
-- AND Z36.CDATE BETWEEN #FDATE# AND #TDATE# -- AND Z36.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS# -- AND ZM2.ZTEAM = '' AND ZM2.ZTEAM = 'X'
-- #SQRY+# -- ORDER BY Z36.PSPID,Z36.POSID,Z36.CHK_KIND,Z36.CHASU,Z36.REQ_GBN FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
